item.title: Report X-2023080417
item.description:
Report X-2023080417

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-03
  • City: SALT LAKE CITY
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: A plastic jerrycan was discovered leaking during sort operations at the SLCR facility. The spill agent observed that the cap was loose on the jerrycan. The cap was tightened and it was placed into a steel salvage package. Shipper will be contacted for an amended declaration for movement.

item.title: Report I-2023060066
item.description:
Report I-2023060066

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-25T00:30:46+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-04-25
  • City: SUNDANCE
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: PILOT THOMAS LOGISTICS LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Driver encountered icy road surface which casued him to loose control of his vehicle which resulted in a rollover accident . Pup trailer separated from the lead trailer. Diesel fuel leaked from Compartment One dome cover for approximately 4 hours while waiting for the equipment needed to extract the diesel fuel from the pup trailer. Broadbent and Associates is overseeing the remediation work with Lincoln Environmental doing the actual work. Excavation is expected to begin in June once the snow has melted. Wasatch County Health Department was on scene and approved the remediation plan.
